name: com.unity.reflect
description: Unity Reflect importer used for Autodesk Revit to Unity and other AEC-Industrial workflow. The package contains Reflect inhouse format support and other utilities for navigation and visualization

samples.description: Samples for the Reflect Actor System API demonstrating how to customize a Reflect Model import into Unity at runtime.
Samples for the Reflect Pipeline API demonstrating how to customize a Reflect Model import into Unity at runtime.
